name: Meaningful Life
description: From Dang: (Click on the screen to play the game, Sorry if it take a while to play) It is recommended to play in full screen mode to see the UI text. This is my first attempt toward a very symbolic artistic style kind of game. Press ASWD to move. For the second scene you can press arrow key up and down to descend and ascend. Hint:(go toward the smoky cave, there only two scene in this game) Ps: This whole game was made using unity primitive only.
